name: The Colour Out of Space
text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -1. (-3 if you are on an Infected location.) [cultist]: -2. (-4 if an investigator or Ally has Withered Away.) [tablet]: -2. If you fail this skill test, lose one action. [elder_thing]: -3. If you fail this skill test, place 1 doom on your investigator.
back_text: Hard / Expert [skull]: -3. (-5 if you are on an Infected location.) [cultist]: -4. (-6 if an investigator or Ally has Withered Away.) [tablet]: -2. If you fail this skill test, lose all remaining actions. [elder_thing]: -5. If you fail this skill test, place 1 doom on your investigator.

name: Otherworldly Weakness
text: Revelation - Put Otherworldly Weakness into play in your threat area. You get -1 [willpower], -1 [intellect], -1 [combat], and -1 [agility]. Treat each [elder_sign] you reveal on a chaos token as [auto_fail]. [action]: Test [willpower](2) or [combat](2). If you succeed, discard Otherworldly Weakness.
